Reviews.Title: great unit
Reviews.Author: James A. Maloney
Reviews.Content: Does great with analog cameras.  Still trying to get a couple non-zmodo ONVIF cameras to work (using latest avail firmware as of 10-15-13).  Works well (very quick) with iphone and ipad, using the zviewer app & vMEye+ app.  Had to strip IE9 of all security to get the web viewing/interface to work, but it is snappy and has never crashed.  Have yet to pull video/audio files off, but was able to with the older model, so I assume it can be done without too much hassle.  Found the zmodo interface software to be much more intuitive.  Also, Typing in ip addresses & passwords (with the mouse) is much easier now.
